properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 7 at 4:09PM AKST until February 9 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills occuring. Blizzard conditions
expected Saturday evening through Sunday evening. Expect wind
chills as cold as 55 below zero. Total snow accumulations of 6
inches, are expected. Visibility will be near zero at times
Saturday night through Sunday.

* WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast.

* WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, 6 PM Saturday to 6 PM
Sunday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, now to 6 PM Saturday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will
cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. The cold wind chills
will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed
skin.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe
winter weather conditions are expected. This will make travel
very difficult or impossible.

A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 6 PM AKST SUNDAY
